titles.title: NATO Infrastructure Fair Share Act
To reduce the amount of the annual contribution of the United States to the North Atlantic Treaty Organization Security Investment program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 11/8/1997--Introduced. NATO Infrastructure Fair Share Act - Amends Federal law to limit U.S. contributions for the North Atlantic Treaty Organization Security Investment program to no more than $140 million during each of FY 1999 through 2001.
